## blendBurn() function

Blends two colors with the burn mode

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function blendBurn(bottom: ColorRGBA64, top: ColorRGBA64): ColorRGBA64;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  bottom | [ColorRGBA64](./fast-colors.colorrgba64.md) |  |
|  top | [ColorRGBA64](./fast-colors.colorrgba64.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ColorRGBA64](./fast-colors.colorrgba64.md)

## Remarks

The alpha channel of the input is ignored
